title: Starting to feel a little like someone is manipulating this.
body:
So recently opened a chest, and this is starting to happen way too often to be a coincidence.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/IfMZWIXNT1CbheoBrB-A8g.png
https://image.prntscr.com/image/TtUnOz1lQJ6gBC9aw6WAXg.png
And the most recent
https://image.prntscr.com/image/_ZNiXuodRByf7mRxL5sZag.png

I feel like your starting to take the piss a little here Riot.

Since the change to BE and the general decrease in the worth of skin shards, i have been getting a lot larger of my pool of potential skins (Or at least the potential good ones) be owned.

So i put it out to you guys as well, have you guys been getting an abnormal amount of the same skins you own, seemingly worse then chance?

From now i'm probably going to be tracking every chest i open, and while i own a decent amount of Epic/legendaries, i also don't really own that many that it feels like this should be happening consistently.

Not to mention chests feel shit anyway because they constantly have champion shards in them.

replies.body:
The backwards part of this, is that the less skins you own, the better hextech crafting is for you.
Buying skins makes the free content worse, so why buy anything?

Cool system Rito.

I got 2 chests... one with Sivir and one with Amumu.

What a great way to reinforce S ranks by giving 90 BE as a reward...

Dunno about too far back but of the last 4 chests I opened 3 had skins I didn't own in them. GotS Skarner, SG Fizz and an Alistar Skin (the cowboy one I think). Could just be RNG one way or the other though. ~~I think Riot released the odds recently though?~~ Apparently the drops for China are different which would make sense cause Garena.
Yeah no china enforces it, which might go further due to the whole star wars battlefront 2 thing.

I hope it does tbh. I don't mind lootboxes so long as they aren't necessary to gameplay in any way, but that's not considering the age rating of these games. Selling chance to kids is....not great. 

At least with League the loot boxes feel like an extra. EA is just a shit show of everything that gives gaming a bad name.

Actually now that you mention it, not just skins but also a lot of champion shards I get are from champions that I already own, and usually when I end up disenchanting them all I only get like 2000 + BE
Oh i get basically 1/3 chests get skin shards (ironically in line with the announcement saying "you will get a skin shard 1 of every 3 boxes because we made it that way")
